abstract: The retail giant said it would shift capital away from its American stores and into overseas expansion, which will account for the bulk of its growth in the years to come.
snippet: The retail giant said it would shift capital away from its American stores and into overseas expansion, which will account for the bulk of its growth in the years to come.
lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart Stores lowered its forecast yesterday for capital spending for the current year, and said it expected to spend still less money building new stores in the following two years.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Lowers Forecast for Capital Spending
